ing: 1 packet Sweet'N Low granulated sugar substitute
des: "To save calories, the aromatic oils in citrus zest replace the Triple Sec liqueur usually used in this classic cocktail."
ins: In a cocktail shaker, muddle the lemon and orange zest with the Sweet'N Low. Add the pomegranate juice and vodka. Fill the shaker halfway with cracked ice and shake vigorously.  Strain into a chilled stemmed glass. Garnish with the lime slice.
